DataElement.preferredName: Form Specified Clinical Study Participation Agreement Due Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the form became due because of agreement to participate in a specific clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Form Specified Clinical Study Participation Agreement Due
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out._Clearly and explicitly stated._Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._The act of taking part in an activity._The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion._Expected or scheduled.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.

Concepts.definition: A printed or electronic document with spaces to be filled out.

Property.preferredName: Specified Clinical Study Participation Agreement Due
Property.preferredDefinition: Clearly and explicitly stated.:Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:The act of taking part in an activity.:The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.:Expected or scheduled.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
The act of taking part in an activity.
The act of agreeing to a plan, protocol, or arrangement. Also used to describe a harmony of opinion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
